name: com.android.launcher3.graphics.GridCustomizationsProvider
description: Exposes various launcher grid options and allows the caller to change them. APIs: /list_options: List the various available grip options, has following columns name: name of the grid rows: number of rows in the grid cols: number of columns in the grid preview_count: number of previews available for this grid option. The preview uri looks like /preview/<grid-name>/<preview index starting with 0> is_default: true if this grid is currently active /preview: Opens a file stream for the grid preview /default_grid: Call update to set the current grid, with values name: name of the grid to apply
